subject: RE: [junit] Query regarding Regarding Mock Objects
msgSnippet: J.B. ... Interesting difference in our reactions. You assumed that it was most likely a typo and I assumed that they were following corporate guidelines.
messageBody:
J.B.

>And sometimes programmers do silly things. I just wanted to know which
>it was. Sometimes the mere act of asking such a question makes the
>programmer think, "Wow, that /is/ silly."

Interesting difference in our reactions. You assumed that it was most likely a typo and I assumed that they were following corporate guidelines. (Perhaps the fact that I work for UberMegaGlobalCorporation Inc. has something to do with my perspective and default assumptions? ;-)

Simon
